1394CF37.Mod4_Description: Ripping your weapon out of enemies during {c_important}Rupture{/c} causes an explosion that deals {c_number}{dot:EXPLOSION_BLEEDING}{/c} Bleeding damage over {c_number}{SF_19}{/c} seconds.

62F3D8B8.Mod5_Description: Hitting at least {c_number}1{/c} enemy with {c_important}Rupture{/c} Heals you for {c_number}[{SF_21}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_21]){/c}.

B252E239.Mod6_Description: Hitting enemies with {c_important}Rupture{/c} increases your Attack Speed by {c_number}[{SF_23} * 100|%+|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:ATTACK_SPEED}{/c} seconds.

F2DE8628.simple_desc: Weapon Mastery Skill: Thrust your weapon into open wounds on the enemy, dealing heavy damage if it is bleeding.
